2019 DraftKings League

Where bragging rights are earned

Are you ready?

Have you been paying attention this off-season? How much pre-season Football have you watched? Are you following trades, signings and injuries? Be sure to check out the resources on the site to help you win.

Let's play!

Make sure you have a DraftKings account and that you're a member of the DraftKings leagu. Set up notifications to let you know when a new contest has started and submit a lineup every week.

Win and get paid!

Some people play for the glory and like winning just to remind others they did. Others play to dominate and earn cash weekly. It won't be easy, but you're likely to place at least once this season. Good luck!
